verbose_text: Disequilibrium of Bim and Bcl-2 or Mcl-1 results in disruption of mitochondrial transmembrane potential, facilitating activation of caspases and eventually leading to cellular apoptosis.
evidence: Bcl-2 or Mcl-1 results in disruption of mitochondrial transmembrane potential, facilitating activation of caspases and eventually leading to cellular apoptosis
